framework_view_mode.if_you_have: If you have your own ESG framework, feel free to upload the framework using our template and we would update the system accordingly.

upload_popup.drag_drop: Drag & Drop file here, Or Click to select file

upload_invalid_format.there_is_an_issue: There is an issue with importing framework. Please check the format again.

popup_message_to_confirm.clicking_ok:
"Clicking ‘OK’ will replace system’s default ESG framework with your own framework.  All previously saved scores, weightages,  qualitative answers and manually input disclosures will be cleared.
Would you like to proceed?"

upload_framework_processing.upload_framework_description: We are updating your framework. Please return in a few minutes.

gri_standards.the_gri_standards_represent: The GRI Standards represent global best practice for reporting publicly on a range of economic, environmental and social impacts.

custom_framework.if_you_have: If you have your own ESG framework, feel free to upload the framework using our template and we would update the system accordingly.

create_framework_popup.download_the_framework: Download the Framework template and fill in your framework details.
create_framework_popup.import: 2. Import your completed framework file to the system by clicking the button below
